price: Sa'an nan bãbu abin da yake da'awarsu, a lõkacin da azãbarMu ta jẽ musu, fãce suka ce: "Lalle ne mũ muka kasance mãsu zãlunci,"
arabic: فَمَا كَانَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَهُم بَأۡسُنَآ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: famā kāna daʿwāhum idh jāahum basunā illā an qālū innā kunnā ẓālimīna
